name: Titanic
overview: The Titanic is in danger - her captain has bottled out (muttering something about "gizzajob" on the way to the lifeboats) and only one man can guide the vast bulk of the Titanic through the icebergs. You are Leonardo DeCappucinno. The Titanic is a big boat, erm ship, so you'll need to worry about keeping all of her away from the icebergs as you dodge and weave your way through arctic waters. Can you keep her afloat and save your girlfriend Kate Windscale from getting her hair wet? Released for the C64 Crap Game Compo #1999
